tool_description:
BasketAPI provides you with live basketball results, schedule and matches that are being played or was played in a date. With over 70 different basketball leagues, among which are college basketball league (NCAA Men and NCAA Women), NBA, Euroleague, A1, Serie A, Liga ACB, Eurocup, ABA Liga, NBB and many other, you can follow live scores, results, tables, statistics, fixtures, standings and previous results by quarters, halftime or final result. BasketAPI has everything you need!
For increased...
name: BasketAPI
title: BasketAPI

api_list.name: Search
api_list.description: Search for basketball players, teams, and tournaments using a search term.

required_parameters.name: term
required_parameters.description: The search term to use

api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://basketapi1.p.rapidapi.com/api/basketball/search/kevin"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "basketapi1.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

print(response.json())
